bibl.title: Egyptian 'Inscriptions' and Greek 'Graffiti' at El Kanais in the Egyptian Eastern Desert.
bibl.note: Three thousand years of graffiti at El Kanais. - Graffiti or inscriptions? - 'Pan-of-the-Good-Hunt who listens to prayer…'. - 'Zenon came up here too'.
bibl.seg: Rachel Mairs, Egyptian 'Inscriptions' and Greek 'Graffiti' at El Kanais in the Egyptian Eastern Desert.
Jennifer A. Baird & Claire Taylor (edd.), Ancient Graffiti in Context = Routledge Studies in Ancient History. 2 (London, 2011) pp. 153-164.
Three thousand years of graffiti at El Kanais. - Graffiti or inscriptions? - 'Pan-of-the-Good-Hunt who listens to prayer…'. - 'Zenon came up here too'.
